format: shell script / variable configuration (likely BitBake recipe snippet with Bash-like syntax)
description: This file contains machine-specific configuration variables and conditional feature settings for the ARM architecture within the OpenEmbedded build system. It defines tuning parameters, endianess, FPU, DSP, and ABI extensions used during the build process.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Checks if a specific feature or string is present within a variable or list, used for conditional configuration based on features like 'bigendian'.
